job_description: Developed responsive web designs, collaborated with cross-functional teams, and ensured high-quality user experience. Worked on complex projects with tight deadlines.
Designed user interfaces, conducted user research, and improved usability of products. Created wireframes and prototypes, leading to enhanced user satisfaction.
Assisted in creating web pages, performed front-end coding, and fixed bugs. Worked closely with senior developers to gain hands-on experience in web development.
Completed an extensive course on CSS, mastering layout techniques, responsive design, and animation. Applied new skills to personal and collaborative projects.
